page.title: 11THE VILLAGE DOCTOR
page.content: Dr.Thomson is the village doctor and he works in the surgery on the Droveway. From Monday to Friday mornings he works from 8.30am to 10.00 and on the evenings of Monday,Tuesday, Thursday and Friday he works from 4.30pm to 6.00pm. He does emergency work from 6.00pm to 8.00pm and he has one weekend off out of three. On his books he has 2000 people and when he has emergency work to do he has 8000 people to care for. He sees about 50 patients each weekday and some people come to him more than once a week. In winter he gets a lot more patients than in the summer. Dr.Thomson said, when interviewed, that coughs, colds and 'flu were the most common illnesses in the village and that most of the time people visited the doctor when they had no need to.
